title: DNA To RNA
description: Convert a DNA sequence into its RNA complement.

tests.description_html: An empty DNA sequence should return an empty RNA sequence.
tests.name: Empty RNA sequence

tests.description_html: The RNA complement of cytosine (C) is guanine (G).
tests.name: Cytosine to guanine

tests.description_html: The RNA complement of guanine (G) is cytosine (C).
tests.name: Guanine to cytosine

tests.description_html: The RNA complement of thymine (T) is adenine (A).
tests.name: Thymine to adenine

tests.description_html: The RNA complement of adenine (A) is uracil (U).
tests.name: Adenine to uracil

tests.description_html: Convert a full DNA sequence to its RNA complement.
tests.name: Full RNA complement
